meanings.definition: To conceive again; to form a new idea or concept.
meanings.sent1: She reconceived her plan after realizing it needed improvement.
meanings.sent2: He reconceived the project to make it more efficient.
meanings.sent3: The students reconceived their group presentation with a fun twist.
meanings.sent4: The artist reconceived the painting, turning it into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The chef reconceived the recipe, creating a delicious new dish.

meanings.definition: To imagine or think of in a new or different way.
meanings.sent1: They reconceived the problem and found a creative solution.
meanings.sent2: She reconceived the story, adding unexpected plot twists.
meanings.sent3: The team reconceived the game strategy, surprising their opponents.
meanings.sent4: He reconceived the building design, making it more innovative.
meanings.sent5: The author reconceived the characters, giving them new depth.
